Name: Name Unknown
Description:
The victim was of Ecuadorian descent.

TvT project: La Rioja 08.08.14 &  11.08.2014

Name: M. Gadelha dos Santos
Description:
M. was stabbed  15 times by her ex-boyfriend.

> A 19-year-old [trans woman] was stabbed to death by her ex-boyfriend on Avenida do Imperador, in the Centro neighborhood , at around 23h of last Friday (8). The suspect of having committed the crime was arrested in the act and told the police that he killed [deadname] Gadelha dos Santos because the victim did not accept the end of the relationship .
>
> The youth was executed with approximately 15 knife blows by Francisco Adauto Rodrigues de Andrade, 31. According to the police, the suspect had filed a number of police reports against the victim, who was pursuing Fransisco Adauto.
>
> The victim lives in  Itapebussu , Maranguap district district and Fortaleza Metropolitan Region (RMF) and reportedly came to Capital to try to resume the relationship with her ex-boyfriend.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Diario do Nordeste 09.08.2014

http://blogs.diariodonordeste.com.br/policia/geral/travesti-e-morto-por-ex-namorado/

Name: N.N.
Description:
The victim's body was found in female underwear and as a newspaper reports "without eyes".

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & Mogi News  12.08.2014

Name: Estrella García Chávez
Description:
Estrella's body was found in a hotel room. Her face showed signs of beating and suffocation, and she had probably also been robbed.

> Estrella worked in a well-known bar in the Javier Rojo Gómez area. There he was drinking on Sunday, August 10, with a 15-year-old boy, with whom he seems to have had romantic relationships.
>
> The body of "Estrella" was found in room 13 by the maid of the Brasilia motel located on Boulevard Luis Donaldo Colosio, where she had arrived at around three in the morning on last Sunday in the company of a subject aboard a vehicle for rent. Estrella's face showed many signs of blows and suffocation and the fact that her wallet or any identification were not found with her body suggests that one of the motives could have been theft.
>
> Estrella's mother went this Monday to the facilities of the Forensic Medical Service (SEMEFO), located in the Unión de Martínez de la Torre neighborhood, to officially identify the body. She indicated that some of her friends had gone to her home located at Boulevard Patricio Chirinos 18 in the Colosio neighborhood and they asked him about "Estrella" but when she told them that she had not been since the day before, they told him about a murdered person with her characteristics and unfortunately she ended up confirming the tragedy.

TvT partner organization: Centro de Apoyo a las Identidades Trans

http://obituariolgbttti.org.mx/estrella-garcia-chavez/

https://elheraldodepozarica.com.mx/policiaca/9363-era-la-estrella.html

Name: Name Unknown
Description:
Two other trans women in Detroit were shot within days of the murder inside Palmer Park. They both survived.

TvT project: Washington Blade 27.08.2014

Name: Samatha Gonçalves
Description:
Samatha was stabbed after an argument with another trans woman.  Andressa Demétrio was subsequently jailed for 8 years and 3 months.

> The [trans woman] Andressa Demétrio, accused of killing [another trans woman] with stab wounds after an axé show , was sentenced to eight years and three months in prison. The trial took place this Friday (5), in Belo Horizonte. The argument which ended in murder was over a wig.
>
> The session was held at the 3rd Jury Court of Belo Horizonte, at the Forum Lafayette, and the sentencing council was composed of six men and one woman.
>
> During interrogation, Andressa confirmed that she knew the victim, another [trans woman] identified as Samantha, from a [sex work] point in Belo Horizonte where the two worked.
>
> On the day of the show, in August 2014, the accused said that they had a disagreement inside the Independência stadium, during which she assaulted and was assaulted. Andressa stated that she needed care due to the severity of her injuries, but later continued on at the event.
>
> Outside the stadium, the [trans woman] stated that she was again threatened and provoked by Samantha and other people. That's when she stabbed the victim.

TvT partner organization Grupo Gay da Bahia & O Globo  16.08.2014
